typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as integer,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(Column_3),
	Column_1 = count(Column_1),
		Column_3 = sum(Column_3)) ~> Aggregate1
